aws_services: CloudTrail, S3, KMS, Glue Data Catalog, Athena, DynamoDB, Lambda, EventBridge, SNS, CloudWatch, IAM
background: CloudTrail log analytics platform for 100 AWS accounts with centralized logging, automated processing, real-time security alerting, compliance reporting, and QuickSight dashboard support. Implements organization-wide trail with multi-region support, data events tracking, Glue Data Catalog for schema discovery, Athena for querying, 5-Lambda processing pipeline, DynamoDB for security findings, 3-tier SNS alerting system, and comprehensive monitoring.
author: raaj1021
